ARGHH  I saw "1988" in the title and thought this was the original.  The re-dub is worthless, I don't recommend anyone watching this. Just the opening song is enough to drive a chill up anyone's spine.  I will note that the video and audio quality are good and this download has no viruses or anything.  But if you're trying to find the beloved classic (like I am), look elsewhere.

Really good movie. I enjoyed it a lot...
Quality of the audio and video is also very good..
Thanks "HobbitGamez"..
A must watch..  :)
